SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.entities

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.entities.GameEntity
com.example.demo.entities.DestructibleEntity
com.example.demo.entities.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.entities.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
DestructibleInterface, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
Represents a Boss entity in the game, which is a type of FighterPlane. The Boss has a shield, a specific move pattern, and can fire projectiles.

  • Property Summary
